creator: maarten_coene@yahoo.com
text:
Hi,

in the manual, the executable attribute of the javadoc task is documented under 
the <tag> subelement of <javadoc> instead of in the <javadoc> element itself.

See http://ant.apache.org/manual/CoreTasks/javadoc.html

regards,
Maarten

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
Was fixed in CVS HEAD, unfortunately not fixed in the branch that 1.6.4 has been
created from.
